second Ralls, Kim Midnight Rain 222
Fantasy 5.95 10/3/05 12
2000-12-16 A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

third Corets, Eva Maeve Ascendant 333

2000-11-17 After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.

fourth Corets, Eva Oberon's Legacy 444

2001-03-10 In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.

fifth Corets, Eva The Sundered Grail 555

2001-09-10 The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.
